content: **per cassidy do not update - access fresh download from this page instead of using library** - tc volunteer editor i would like to dedicate the myriad cal to pauline vos my soulmate in crochet and beyond **just for the french translation due to a mistake in round 44 i uploaded a new version part 4 french ** **updated today 8 nov 2018 a new chart for the parts 12 and 13 due to a small error found ** **in part 12 round 99 the total stitches must be 356 instead of 305** myriad will become a blanket with a myriad of different stitches and a lovely texture made with hook 4 5 and dk yarn the size will be 160 x 160 cm there will be a possibility to increase the blanket with squares these additional squares to extend myriad are to be used between part 14 and 15 just the pattern of it will be offered not the way how to join the cal started at august 2 2018 the 15 parts in 15 languages as well as a universal chart will be published weekly video part 1 https //www youtube
